mapper.insert: insert into department (DeptID, SubjectCode, SubjectName, DeptName, DeputyDoctorCertID, DeputyDoctorName, PrincipalDoctorCertID, PrincipalDoctorName, DisableFlag) values (#{deptID,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deputyDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deputyDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{principalDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disableFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update department
SubjectCode = #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SubjectName = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeputyDoctorCertID = #{deputyDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

PrincipalDoctorCertID = #{principalDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

DisableFlag = #{disableFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where DeptID = #{deptID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update department set SubjectCode = #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SubjectName = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeputyDoctorCertID = #{deputyDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeputyDoctorName = #{deputyDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PrincipalDoctorCertID = #{principalDoctorCertID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PrincipalDoctorName = #{principalDoctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DisableFlag = #{disableFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DeptID = #{deptID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

and DeptName = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
